title: Quality Assure Youth Mental Health Variables
text: youthvars package defines number vector based classes can used quality assure data recorded individual variables. youthvars variable classes potentially useful : facilitating automated data integrity checks verify impermissible values (e.g. utility scores greater one) present source data, transformed data results; automating selection appropriate method apply data type.

title: Quality Assure Youth Mental Health Variables
text: initial set classes included youthvars package one class Assessment Quality Life (Adolescent) health utility one predictors used utility prediction algorithms included related youthu package.

what: Assessment of Quality of Life Six Dimension (Adolescent) Health Utility
title: Quality Assure Youth Mental Health Variables
text: youthvars_aqol6d_adol class defined numeric vectors minimum value 0.03 maximum value 1.0. Non numeric objects values outside ranges produce errors.
code: youthvars_aqol6d_adol(0.4) ## [1] 0.4 ## attr(,"class") ## [1] "youthvars_aqol6d_adol" "numeric" youthvars_aqol6d_adol(c(0.03,0.2,1)) ## [1] 0.03 0.20 1.00 ## attr(,"class") ## [1] "youthvars_aqol6d_adol" "numeric" youthvars_aqol6d_adol("0.5") ## Error in make_new_youthvars_aqol6d_adol(x): is.numeric(x) is not TRUE youthvars_aqol6d_adol(-0.1) ## Error: All non-missing values in valid youthvars_aqol6d_adol object must be greater than or equal to 0.03. youthvars_aqol6d_adol(1.2) ## Error: All non-missing values in valid youthvars_aqol6d_adol object must be less than or equal to 1.

title: Describe And Disseminate Youth Mental Health Datasets
text: dataset cross-sectional wish treat (.e., data collection rounds ignored) can create Y, instance YouthvarsProfile module, add minimal metadata (name unique identifier variable). temporal dimension dataset important, may therefore preferable instead transform X YouthvarsSeries module instance. YouthvarsSeries objects contain fields YouthvarsProfile objects, also include additional fields specific longitudinal datasets (e.g. timepoint_var_nm_1L_chr timepoint_vals_chr respectively specify data-collection timepoint variable name values participation_var_1L_chr specifies desired name yet created variable summarise data-collection timepoints unit record supplied data).
